workflow.name: Transform videos with FAL AI avatar swaps & voice and publish to TikTok with Blotato
workflow.description:
# Convert Viral Videos into AI Avatar Swaps and Publish on TikTok with Blotato

![Workflow Overview](https://www.dr-firas.com/wan.png)

### Who is this for?
This workflow is designed for content creators, agencies, influencers, and automation builders who want to transform viral videos into personalized avatar-based edits â€” and automatically publish them on TikTok (and other platforms) without manual editing or video software.

### What problem is this workflow solving?
Replacing a character in a video, transforming the voice, merging audio/video, and publishing to social networks typically requires multiple tools, editing skills, and a lot of time.  
This workflow automates the entire pipeline end-to-end:

- No manual video editing  
- No audio processing  
- No API debugging  
- No uploading/publishing hassles  

Itâ€™s a full AI-powered transformation system that produces ready-to-post content in minutes.

### What this workflow does
This workflow receives an avatar image + a viral video URL and automatically:

1. Extracts the audio using Replicate  
2. Replaces the character in the video using **FAL WAN Replace**  
3. Transforms the voice using **FAL Chatterbox Speech-to-Speech**  
4. Merges the new video and audio using **FAL FFmpeg**  
5. Saves results to Google Sheets for tracking  
6. Publishes the final video to **TikTok** via Blotato (and optionally to Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, X, and YouTube)  
7. Sends a confirmation message when publishing is complete

Everything runs automatically, in parallel, for maximum speed.

### Setup
1. **Telegram Bot**  
   - Add your Telegram Bot credentials in the **Telegram Trigger** node.  
   - Send an avatar photo + video URL in one message (URL in the caption).

2. **Workflow Configuration**  
   - Add your **FAL API key**  
   - Add your **Replicate API key**  
   - Add your **targetVoiceAudioUrl** (this is the voice the output will use)

3. **Google Sheets**  
   - Connect your Google Sheets OAuth credentials  
   - Select your sheet and ensure columns exist (e.g. original URL, output URL)

4. **Blotato Publishing**  
   - Install community node `@blotato/n8n-nodes-blotato`  
   - Connect your [Blotato](https://blotato.com/?ref=firas) API credentials  
   - Select the TikTok account (and optional other accounts)

5. **Test the workflow**  
   - Send a Telegram message with:
     - A photo (avatar)
     - Video URL in the caption  
   - The workflow will process everything automatically.

### How to customize this workflow to your needs
- **Change platforms**: remove or add publishing outputs (TikTok, Instagram, LinkedIn, Facebook, YouTube, X).  
- **Change voice style**: update the `targetVoiceAudioUrl` in the Workflow Configuration node.  
- **Use your own avatar**: send any image in Telegram â€” the workflow automatically makes it public and ready for AI processing.  
- **Adjust video logic**: swap FAL models, update merg

---

const caption = $input.first().json.message.caption || '';
return [{ json: { videoUrl: caption.trim() } }];

parameters.content:
# Convert viral videos into AI avatar swaps and publish on TikTok with Blotato

This workflow transforms videos by replacing the character's face with a custom avatar and changing the voice, then outputs the final result to Google Sheets.

### How it works
1. **Receive input via Telegram**: User sends an avatar image (photo) and video URL (in message caption)
2. **Extract audio**: Separates the audio track from the original video using Replicate API
3. **Transform in parallel**: Simultaneously replaces the character in the video (FAL WAN API) and transforms the voice (FAL Chatterbox API)
4. **Merge results**: Combines the transformed video and audio into a single output file (FAL FFmpeg API)
5. **Save to Google Sheets**: Writes the original and final video URLs to a spreadsheet for tracking

### Setup
- [ ] Configure Telegram Bot credentials in the Telegram Trigger node
- [ ] Set your FAL API key in the Workflow Configuration node (falApiKey field)
- [ ] Set your Replicate API key in the Workflow Configuration node (replicateApiKey field)
- [ ] Update the target voice audio URL in Workflow Configuration node (targetVoiceAudioUrl field) - this is the voice the output will sound like
- [ ] Configure Google Sheets credentials in the OUTPUT (Google Sheet Write) node
- [ ] Select your target Google Sheet and ensure it has columns: url original and url output
- [ ] Test the workflow by sending a Telegram message with an avatar photo and video URL in the caption

## INPUT: TELEGRAM

Receives the avatar image and source video URL from a Telegram message to start the transformation pipeline.

### How it works
1. **Telegram Trigger** listens for incoming messages with photos
2. **Extract Video URL** parses the message caption to get the source video URL
3. **Get Avatar File** downloads the highest resolution photo from the message
4. **Upload to tmpfiles.org** creates a publicly accessible URL for the avatar image
5. **Merge inputs** combines all data (video URL, avatar URL, config) before processing

## STEP 1: SEPARATE AUDIO & VIDEO

Extracts the audio track from the source video so it can be transformed independently from the video.

### How it works
1. **Separate Audio** calls Replicate's extract-audio API with the source video URL
2. **Wait** pauses for 5 seconds to allow the extraction job to process
3. **Download Audio** fetches the extracted audio file URL from the completed job
4. The audio URL is then passed to the voice transformation step

## STEP 2: TRANSFORM (PARALLEL)

Simultaneously processes video and audio transformations to optimize workflow speed.

### How it works
1. **Transform Video** (FAL WAN Replace): Replaces the character's face in the video with the uploaded avatar image
2. **Transform Audio** (FAL Chatterbox): Converts the extracted audio to match the target voice style
3. Both transformations run in parallel, each with their own wait/fetch cycle
4. **Wait & Fetch** nodes poll the APIs every 5 seconds until jobs complete
5. **Merge URLs** combines the transformed video and audio URLs for the final merge step

## STEP 3: COMBINE & OUTPUT

Merges the transformed video and audio into a single file and saves the result to Google Sheets.

### Setup
- [ ] Verify FAL API key is set in Workflow Configuration node for FFmpeg API access
- [ ] Configure Google Sheets OAuth2 credentials in the OUTPUT (Google Sheet Write) node
- [ ] Select your target spreadsheet and sheet (must have url original and url output columns)
- [ ] The final video URL will be publicly accessible and can be downloaded or shared
- [ ] Check Google Sheets after execution to verify the URLs were written correctly
- [ ] If merge fails, verify both video and audio URLs from Step 2 are valid and accessible

parameters.content:
# STEP 4: PUBLISHING & TRACKING

### Install the Blotato [Blotato](https://blotato.com/?ref=firas) Node in n8n (Community Nodes)
1. In n8n, open **Settings â†’ Community Nodes**.  
2. Click **Install**, then add: `@blotato/n8n-nodes-blotato`.  
3. Log in to **Blotato**.  
4. Go to **Settings â†’ API Keys**.  
5. In n8n â†’ **Credentials â†’ New**.  
6. Choose **Blotato API** 
(provided by the community node you installed).  

2. TikTok Publishing (Blotato):
   â€¢ Pre-configured to auto-publish
   â€¢ Uses caption from GPT-4
   â€¢ Privacy: Public
   â€¢ Requires Blotato API key from Step 2

values.content:
=Create an engaging TikTok caption for a video:

Based on these Transcription: {{ $json.text }}

Requirements:
- Catchy hook in first line
- Include 5-8 relevant trending hashtags
- Keep it concise and engaging
- Optimize for TikTok algorithm
- Return 2 informations : the caption text with hashtags, and the title nothing else
